00015 class ImageFormat_StdinProxy: public FileFormat

00020     std::string suffixes( io_modes /*modes=both*/ )const {
00021         return std::string( "process" );

00023 public:
00024     std::string dialects( const std::string &/*filename*/ )const {
00025 
00026         std::list<util::istring> suffixes;
00027         BOOST_FOREACH( data::IOFactory::FileFormatPtr format, data::IOFactory::getFormats() ) {
00028             const std::list<util::istring> s = format->getSuffixes();
00029             suffixes.insert( suffixes.end(), s.begin(), s.end() );
00030         }
00031         suffixes.sort();
00032         suffixes.unique();
00033 
00034         return std::string( util::listToString( suffixes.begin(), suffixes.end(), " ", "", "" ) );
00035     }
00036     std::string getName()const {return "process proxy (gets filenames from child process given in the filename)";}
00037 
00038     int load ( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect ) throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00039         size_t red = 0;
00040         LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Running " << util::MSubject( filename );
00041         FILE *in = popen( filename.c_str(), "r" );
00042 
00043         if( in == NULL ) {
00044             std::string err = "Failed to run \"";
00045             err += filename + "\"";
00046             throwSystemError( errno, err );
00047         }
00048 
00049         char got;
00050         std::string fname;
00051 
00052         while( ( got = fgetc( in ) ) != EOF ) {
00053             if( got == '\n' ) {
00054                 if( !fname.empty() ) {
00055                     LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Got " << util::MSubject( fname ) << " from " << util::MSubject( filename );
00056                     red += data::IOFactory::load( chunks, fname, dialect, "" );
00057                     fname.clear();
00058                 }
00059             } else {
00060                 fname += got;
00061             }
00062         }
00063 
00064         pclose( in );
00065         return red;
00066     }
00067 
00068     void write( const data::Image &/*image*/, const std::string &/*filename*/, const std::string &/*dialect*/ )throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00069         throw( std::runtime_error( "not yet implemented" ) );
00070     }
00071     bool tainted()const {return false;}//internal plugins are not tainted
00072 };
00073 }
